results.title: Effects of beta-adrenoceptor blockade on heart rate and physiological tremor in diabetics with autonomic neuropathy. A comparative study of epanolol, atenolol and pindolol.
results.text_hl: Eight @DISEASE_Diabetes_Mellitus @DISEASE_MESH:D003920 @@@diabetics@@@ with @<m>DISEASE_Nervous_System_Diseases</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D009422 @@@autonomic neuropathy@@@ were given single oral doses of @CHEMICAL_epanolol @CHEMICAL_MESH:C038616 @@@epanolol@@@ (200 mg), @<m>CHEMICAL_Atenolol</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D001262 @@@atenolol@@@ (50 mg), @CHEMICAL_Pindolol @CHEMICAL_MESH:D010869 @@@pindolol@@@ (5 mg) and placebo in a double-blind randomised order at weekly intervals.

citations.NLM: Reid W, Ewing DJ, Harry JD, Smith HJ, Neilson JM, Clarke BF. Effects of beta-adrenoceptor blockade on heart rate and physiological tremor in diabetics with autonomic neuropathy. A comparative study of epanolol, atenolol and pindolol. Br J Clin Pharmacol. 1987 Apr;23(4):383-9. PMID: 2883987

A comparative study of epanolol, atenolol and pindolol.}, author={Reid W and Ewing DJ and Harry JD and Smith HJ and Neilson JM and Clarke BF}, journal={Br J Clin Pharmacol}, volume={23}, number={4}, pages={383-9}}

results.title: Atenolol. A reappraisal of its pharmacological properties and therapeutic use in cardiovascular disorders.

citations.NLM: Wadworth AN, Murdoch D, Brogden RN. Atenolol. A reappraisal of its pharmacological properties and therapeutic use in cardiovascular disorders. Drugs. 1991 Sep;42(3):468-510. PMID: 1720383

results.title: Beta-adrenoceptor antagonists: studies on behaviour (delayed differentiation) in the monkey (Macaca mulatta).
results.text_hl: @<m>CHEMICAL_Atenolol</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D001262 @@@Atenolol@@@ and @CHEMICAL_Acebutolol @CHEMICAL_MESH:D000070 @@@acebutolol@@@ may prove to be particularly useful in man when @<m>DISEASE_Nervous_System_Diseases</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D009422 @@@disturbances of the nervous system@@@ are to be avoided.

citations.NLM: Nicholson AN, Wright CM. Beta-adrenoceptor antagonists: studies on behaviour (delayed differentiation) in the monkey (Macaca mulatta). Br J Pharmacol. 1980 Jan;68(1):75-82. PMID: 6101977
